com.ikanow.aleph2.data_model.utils

Class CrudUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ikanow.aleph2.data_model.utils.CrudUtils

  • public class CrudUtils
extends Object
    Very simple set of query builder utilties
    Author:
    acp

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  CrudUtils.BeanUpdateComponent<T>
      A component for a bean repo (rather than a raw JSON one)
      static class  CrudUtils.CommonUpdateComponent<T>
      Common building and getting functions
      static class  CrudUtils.JsonUpdateComponent<T>
      A component for a raw JSON repo (rather than a bean one)
      static class  CrudUtils.MultiQueryComponent<T>
      Encapsulates a very set of queries, all ANDed or ORed together
      static class  CrudUtils.Operator 
      static class  CrudUtils.QueryComponent<T>
      Just an empty parent of SingleQueryComponent (SingleBeanQueryComponent, SingleJsonQueryComponent) and MultiQueryComponent
      static class  CrudUtils.SingleBeanQueryComponent<T>
      Helper class to generate queries for an object of type T
      static class  CrudUtils.SingleJsonQueryComponent<T> 
      static class  CrudUtils.SingleQueryComponent<T>
      Encapsulates a very simple query - this top level all
      static class  CrudUtils.UpdateComponent<T> 
      static class  CrudUtils.UpdateOperator

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <T> CrudUtils.SingleJsonQueryComponent<T> allOf_json(BeanTemplateUtils.BeanTemplate<T> t)
      Returns a query component where all of the fields in t (together with other fields added using withAny/withAll) must match Returns a type safe version that can be used in the raw JSON CRUD services Recommend using the clazz version unless you are generating lots of different queries from a single template

        @SafeVarargs
public static <T> CrudUtils.MultiQueryComponent<T> allOf(CrudUtils.QueryComponent<T> component1,
                                                                       CrudUtils.QueryComponent<T>... components)
        Returns a "multi" query component where all of the QueryComponents in the list (and added via andAlso) must match (NOTE: each component *internally* can use ORs or ANDs)
        Parameters:
        components - - a list of query components
        Returns:
        the "multi" query component "helper"
